text: Jason Donovan (born 1 June 1968) is an Australian actor and singer. Donovan became famous when he played Scott Robinson in Neighbours from 1986 to 1989. He was a contestant in the 2006 series of I'm a Celebrity ... Get Me Out of Here! and in the 2011 series of Strictly Come Dancing. He hosts a show on Heart Network Radio in the UK on Sunday afternoons. ==Early life== Donovan was born in Malvern, Melbourne. He was taught at De La Salle College. He is the son of actor Terence Donovan and newsreader Sue McIntosh. The youngest of his three maternal half-sisters is actress-singer Stephanie McIntosh. == References == == Other websites == *Official website * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Melbourne Category:Australian child actors Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian pop musicians Category:Australian radio personalities Category:Australian singers Category:Australian television actors Category:I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here! contestants Category:Musicians from Melbourne Category:Strictly Come Dancing participants
title: Jason Donovan
